name: HEATHEN
description:
Summary

HEATHEN is a short platformer metroidvania-lite that follows the path of a rotund lemon-colored protagonist who somehow ended up in the lair of a mysterious cult. What now? 

  • Procure powerups to proceed past a plethora of impediments
  • Battle a binary batch of big bad bosses bent upon blood
  • Challenge your courage as you careen through a cavalcade of cursed confrontations
Controls
  • Left and Right arrow keys to Move
  • Down to crouch
  • Spacebar to Jump
  • F to Attack (with power-up)
  • P to Pause
  • ESC to Restart
